ModMetaData.name: Project RimFactory Revived - Autopsy Machine (OP Patch)
ModMetaData.author: GeodesicDragon
ModMetaData.description: ABOUT Patches the Autopsy Machine to make it stupidly overpowered. - Work range can be overclocked up to 384 tiles, which is enough to cover the entirety of a normal sized map. - Base power consumption is reduced to just 1W instead of 1000W. - Build cost is changed to a single piece of steel instead of 4 robotic arms, a medium machine frame and a basic AI chip. - Increasing the range now uses an extra 1W of power per step instead of 200. - Increasing the work speed now uses an extra 1W of power per step instead of 250.
